title: The Empress’ Livestream - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Comedy   Gender Bender   Historical   Josei   Romance
tags: Adapted to Manhua   Ancient China   Army   Army Building   Complex Family Relationships   Cross-dressing   Female Protagonist   Game Elements   Kingdom Building   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Loyal Subordinates   Management   Military   Multiple POV   Multiple Transported Individuals   Politics   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Strategic Battles   System Administrator   Transmigration
author: Quick-fried Mushroom   油爆香菇
description:
Jiang Pengji got something called the Court Intrigue Stream System.

System: “Your goal is to become the most prestigious woman in the kingdom (the Queen)!”
Jiang Pengji: “Okay, System. No problem!”

Years later, she met the target by becoming the most prestigious woman (the Empress).

Jiang Pengji: “Well done, no?”
System: “Why the heck did you fight on horseback? I want court intrigue among the King’s women!”

#how a future general wins the ancient throne

#Her man watches in silence, the System watches with tears>
